title: Validate "Subject Line" Details in Application events Table and in Details side panel; feature is DISABLED
custom_steps:
- Enable webui feature flag, however put feature in disable state
- Generate traffic  to have app event/ alerts data with Subject line recorded disabled
- Navigate to SkopeIt -> Application events or Alerts pages
- Click on gear icon at right to customize columns
- try to check "Subject Line" checkbox
- verify Subject line data empty is side panel detailed view and it should be added in Application section
custom_expected:
- review Subject line data is side panel detailed view and it should be added in Application section 
- it should have subject text as empty string as subject recording is disabled.
